mapper.select:
select m.menu_id menuId, m.menu_name menuName, m.auth_code authCode, m.parent_id parentId, m.url, m.remark from sys_menu m where 1=1
and m.menu_name like CONCAT('%', #{menuName}, '%')
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_MENU SET menu_name = #{menuName}, updatetime = SYSDATE(), updater=#{updater} WHERE menu_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from ( select m.menu_id authId, m.menu_name authName, m.parent_id parentId, false authFlag from sys_menu m where state = 1 order by sort ) t1 union all select * from ( select auth_code authId, auth_name authName, menu_id parentId, true authFlag from sys_menu_authcode where state = 1 order by menu_id asc,auth_code asc ) t2
